name: Traditional Board Games
overview: A collection of six traditional board games of logic and strategy from around the world, adapted for the computer so that you can either play against an opponent or against the computer. Three Men's Morris is an English game. Ba-Awa is an African game played with rice seeds and boxes. Ming-Mang is a Tibetan game. Six Men's Morris is a more complex version of Three Men's Morris. Fox And Geese is an English game. Tablut is a Swedish chess-like game. Full playing instructions are included in-game.
